# GET /v1/appStoreReviewDetails/{id}/relationships/appStoreReviewAttachments | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/appStoreReviewDetails/{id}/relationships/appStoreReviewAttachments ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreReviewDetails-_id_-relationships-appStoreReviewAttachments)

-  GET /v1/appStoreReviewDetails/{id}/relationships/appStoreReviewAttachments 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appStoreReviewDetails/{id}/relationships/appStoreReviewAttachments

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreReviewDetails-_id_-relationships-appStoreReviewAttachments#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreReviewDetails/{id}/relationships/appStoreReviewAttachments
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreReviewDetails-_id_-relationships-appStoreReviewAttachments#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreReviewDetails-_id_-relationships-appStoreReviewAttachments#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreReviewDetails-_id_-relationships-appStoreReviewAttachments#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppStoreReviewDetailAppStoreReviewAttachmentsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appstorereviewdetailappstorereviewattachmentslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreReviewDetails-_id_-relationships-appStoreReviewAttachments#see-also)

### [Reading Attachment Information](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreReviewDetails-_id_-relationships-appStoreReviewAttachments#Reading-Attachment-Information)

[`Read App Store Review Attachment Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstorereviewattachments-_id_)Get information about an App Store review attachment and its upload and processing status.[`List All Review Attachments for an App Store Review Detail`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstorereviewdetails-_id_-appstorereviewattachments)List all the App Store review attachments you include with a version when you submit it for App Review.
